relationships.desc: Radio City is located in India.
Radio City is a private FM radio station started on 3 July 2001.
Radio City broadcasts songs in the Hindi language.
Radio City launched PlanetRadiocity.com in May 2008.
PlanetRadiocity.com is a music portal that offers music related news, videos and more.

other_relationships.desc: Radio City forayed into New Media in May 2008.
